sourcesContent:
import { BeerService } from './beer.service'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Beer } from './beer'; import { HttpErrorResponse } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'], }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { title = 'beermanagerapp'; public beers!: Beer[]; constructor(private BeerService: BeerService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getBeers(); } public getBeers(): void { this.BeerService.getBeers().subscribe( (response: Beer[]) => { this.beers = response; }, (err: HttpErrorResponse) => { alert(err.message); } ); } }
